DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to assess of the influence of atorvastatin on selected indicators of an inflammatory condition, function of the left ventricle and factors affecting the occurrence of undesired events like rehospitalizations and mortality in patients with dilated cardiomyopathy.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Atorvastatin on the Parameters of Inflammation and the Function of Left Ventricle
